title: Home Page Render and Responsiveness
description: Verify the Home page loads correctly, displays the hero carousel, featured room cards, the how-it-works section, and is responsive on desktop and mobile devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the Home page URL
Check the hero background carousel is present and auto-playing
Verify featured room cards are displayed with images and relevant info
Confirm the how-it-works section is visible with clear steps
Resize browser viewport to mobile dimensions
Verify that all page elements reflow correctly and content remains accessible

title: Rooms Page Listing and Filter by Availability
description: Check that the Rooms page displays all active escape rooms with offer badges and allows filtering by availability accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to the Rooms page URL
Verify a grid of all active rooms is displayed, each with image, name, difficulty, and offer badge if applicable
Apply filter to display only available rooms for a selected date
Confirm that only rooms available on that date are shown
Clear filter and verify the full list is restored

title: Room Detail Page Content and Booking Link
description: Validate the Room Detail page shows correct information including images, difficulty, player count, duration, pricing, and has a working booking link.

steps.description: Navigate to a Room Detail page using a valid room slug
Verify the presence of room images gallery
Check that difficulty, player count, duration, and pricing details are correctly shown
Confirm the booking button or link is visible and routing to the correct booking page
Click the booking link
Verify navigation to the multi-step booking flow page for the selected room

title: Booking Flow: Date and Time Slot Selection Validation
description: Ensure users can select a booking date and time slot with real-time availability checks preventing overbooking and dynamic updates of available slots.

steps.description: Navigate to the Booking page for a given room
Select a past date from the calendar
Verify that selecting a past date is blocked or shows an error
Select a valid future date with known availability
Check that available time slots load dynamically for the chosen date
Select a time slot which has remaining capacity
Confirm selection is accepted
Attempt to select an overbooked or fully booked time slot
Verify that the overbooked slot is disabled or an error message is displayed

title: Booking Flow: Player Count Limits Validation
description: Verify that users can specify the player count within allowed limits for the selected escape room during booking.

steps.description: Navigate to Booking page and select a valid date and time slot
Enter a player count below minimum allowed
Verify validation error is shown for too few players
Enter a player count above maximum allowed
Verify validation error is shown for too many players
Enter a player count within allowed range
Ensure no validation errors and player count is accepted

title: Booking Flow: Customer Information Form Validation
description: Validate customer information form fields including name, email, and phone enforce required constraints and proper data formats.

steps.description: Navigate to Booking page and reach the customer info step
Submit the form with empty required fields
Verify validation errors are displayed for missing name, email, or phone
Input invalid email format
Check validation error for invalid email
Input invalid phone number format
Verify validation error for invalid phone format
Correct all fields with valid data
Confirm form accepts the data without errors

title: Booking Flow: Promo Code Application and Validation
description: Test that promo codes can be applied during booking with correct validation and changes to pricing based on code validity and rules.

steps.description: Proceed to promo code input step in the Booking flow
Enter an invalid promo code
Verify that an appropriate error message is shown and price is unchanged
Enter a valid promo code that applies a discount
Confirm price updates correctly reflecting the promo code discount
Submit the promo code and remove it
Verify price returns to original amount

title: Booking Submission: Successful Booking and Confirmation Display
description: Verify that a completed booking submits successfully, persists, and the Confirmation page displays booking details and contact options.

steps.description: Complete all booking steps with valid inputs including date, time, players, customer info, and promo code
Submit the booking
Verify booking is accepted and user is redirected to the confirmation page
Check that booking details including room, date, time, players, total price, and promo code are correctly displayed
Confirm presence of contact options (phone, email, etc.) on confirmation page

title: Events Page Content and Navigation
description: Ensure the Events page displays cards for Corporate, School Trips, and Birthday events with relevant information.

steps.description: Navigate to the Events page
Verify presence of event cards for Corporate, School Trips, and Birthday categories
Check each card shows a title, description, and a call to action or contact info

title: Contact Page: Form Validation and Submission
description: Validate that the Contact page form requires name, valid email, phone, and message fields and displays success notifications upon submission.

steps.description: Navigate to the Contact page
Submit the contact form with all fields empty
Verify validation errors for required fields are displayed
Enter invalid email format and submit
Check validation error displayed for email
Fill all fields correctly and submit
Confirm form submits successfully and a toast notification is shown

title: Find Us Page: Map, Address, and Social Links
description: Check that the Find Us page embeds Google Maps correctly, displays the physical address, opening hours, and social media links.

steps.description: Navigate to the Find Us page
Verify the embedded Google Maps is visible and centered correctly
Confirm the physical address and opening hours are displayed accurately
Check that social media icons/links are present and clickable

title: Language Switching and Layout Direction
description: Validate that switching between English and Arabic languages updates UI text accordingly and changes layout direction between LTR and RTL without UI breakage.

steps.description: Locate and trigger the language switcher to Arabic
Verify all visible UI text elements update to Arabic translations
Check page layout changes to right-to-left (RTL) direction
Switch back to English
Verify UI text returns to English and layout direction is left-to-right (LTR)
Confirm no content or UI is broken during language switch

title: Admin Login Security and Access Control
description: Test the admin login page enforces Supabase email/password authentication and restricts access to admin routes without valid login.

steps.description: Navigate to /admin/login page
Attempt login with invalid credentials
Verify login fails and appropriate error message is shown
Login with valid admin credentials
Confirm login success and redirection to /admin/dashboard
Attempt to access /admin/dashboard without logging in
Verify access is denied or redirected to login page

title: Admin Dashboard: Booking Statistics and Charts Display
description: Verify that the Admin Dashboard page displays accurate booking statistics and renders charts properly.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to /admin/dashboard
Verify booking statistics (count, revenue, etc.) are visible and accurate based on data
Check that charts render correctly without visual errors

title: Admin Rooms Management: Edit and Deactivate Room
description: Test that admin can edit room details and deactivate rooms via the Admin Rooms page with updates reflected on the public Rooms page.

steps.description: Login and navigate to /admin/rooms
Select a room and modify details such as name, difficulty, or pricing
Save the changes
Verify changes persist and are reflected in the database
Deactivate the same room
Ensure the room no longer appears on the public Rooms page

title: Admin Pricing and Promo Codes: Create, Update, and Validation
description: Ensure admins can manage pricing tiers and promo codes, including creating, editing, and deleting, with proper validation.

steps.description: Login and navigate to /admin/pricing
Create a new pricing tier with valid input
Verify the new pricing tier appears and persists
Create a promo code with invalid inputs (e.g., missing code or discount value)
Check for validation errors and preventing saving
Edit an existing promo code and update discount value
Confirm updates persist and apply correctly during booking

title: Admin Bookings Management: View, Update Status, and Notes
description: Verify admin can view all bookings, update booking statuses, and add internal notes with changes saved properly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to /admin/bookings
Verify list of bookings with relevant data is displayed
Select a booking and change its status (e.g., confirmed, canceled)
Add an internal note to the booking
Save changes
Confirm that status and notes updates persist and are reflected in booking details

title: Admin Customers View and External Sync
description: Test viewing customer lists in Admin Customers and External Customers pages including search, date filtering, and CSV export functionalities.

steps.description: Login and access /admin/customers and /admin/external-customers pages
Verify that customer lists load correctly with accurate data
Use search input to filter customers by name or email
Confirm search results are relevant and update dynamically
Apply date range filters
Check the filtered customer list respects the selected dates
Trigger CSV export
Verify CSV file downloads and contains expected customer data

title: Admin Events Management: Lead Handling and Updates
description: Confirm that admin can manage event inquiry leads, update lead details, and mark statuses appropriately in the Admin Events page.

steps.description: Login and navigate to /admin/events
Verify event leads are listed with details like contact info and event type
Update lead status or add comments
Save changes
Confirm updates persist and reflect in the UI

title: Notification Toasts on User Actions
description: Verify that user actions such as form submissions, booking confirmations, promo code application, and errors trigger appropriate Sonner toast notifications.

steps.description: Submit booking form successfully
Confirm success toast notification appears
Apply invalid promo code
Verify error toast notification appears
Submit contact form successfully
Check that success toast notification is displayed

title: Analytics Tracking on Key User Actions
description: Ensure Meta Pixel and Google Analytics events are correctly fired during user actions such as page views, bookings, and promo code usage without errors.

steps.description: Navigate through main public pages including Home, Rooms, Room Detail, Booking, Confirmation
Verify page view events are sent to analytics platforms
Complete a booking process including promo code application
Confirm booking and promo code usage events are tracked
